title: Executive Order 5948-Modification of Withdrawal of Lands in Aid of Legislation, Michigan
content: Pursuant to the authority conferred upon me by the act of Congress approved June 25, 1910 (36 Stat. 847-848), as amended by the act of Congress approved August 24, 1912 (37 Stat. 497), Executive Order No. 4693, of July 18, 1927, withdrawing SW. ¼ SW. ¼ sec. 20, T. 49 N., R. 34 W., Michigan meridian, Michigan, from all forms of appropriation, is hereby modified, for the purpose of permitting the State of Michigan to select the land under the provisions of the act of July 31, 1912 (37 Stat. 241).
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5948-Modification of Withdrawal of Lands in Aid of Legislation, Michigan Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361521
